based on.from sentence: Because of advantages of neural networks , we approach this aspect level sentiment classification problem based on long short - term memory ( LSTM ) neural networks .

aspects and texts simultaneously.from sentence: Previous LSTM - based methods mainly focus on modeling texts separately , while our approach models aspects and texts simultaneously using LSTMs .

target representation and text represent.from sentence: Furthermore , the target representation and text representation generated from LSTMs interact with each other by an attention - over - attention ( AOA ) module .

AOA.from sentence: AOA automatically generates mutual attentions not only from aspect - to - text but also text - to - aspect .

choose.from sentence: That is why we choose AOA to attend to the most important parts in both aspect and sentence .
